query:
SELECT g.id as gestor_id, u.name as nome, COUNT(gl.lojaId) as total_lojas
FROM gestores g
JOIN users u ON u.id = g.userId
LEFT JOIN gestor_lojas gl ON gl.gestorId = g.id
WHERE u.name LIKE '%Fabio%' OR u.name LIKE '%Fábio%'
GROUP BY g.id, u.name;
